name: Jetpack FunRide
description:
You play as Larry, the CEO of a board game company. With the rise of video games sales from his company have plummeted and he is on the verge of bankruptcy. After hearing about the first ever time machine made by the Halfblock research institute, Larry breaks into to steal it and along the way takes a jetpack and causes lots of chaos and mayhem. 

all so comes with an apk for android
